text: <!channel>: I'm keeping my germs to myself for another day! Would love to do a quick stand-up (uh, sit down) on the phone at 10am. Someone call me?
and quick notes - let's please order the NUK and the 80/20 hardware mock-up. All of that is approved.

Sitting out here at the walnut table, I can't seem to find anyone for standup, so here goes my update: 
Played with the projector for a while yesterday, looking at type, scale, line widths, patterns, etc. Going to be narrowing down to a few possible art directions for the rest of the day today. Also will need to start thinking about user flows and wires against their script.
I know Joel is stuck in traffic, not sure about the rest of the team.
Sorry Mary! I'm engrossed in laptop setup stuff. I've still got nothing, but Evans, Joel, & I are meeting this afternoon to go over stuff so far
Bridge is up, so I'm here a while.
Working on getting updated drivers from Asus, possibly new camera from Intel
Did you get our existing three cameras up and running yesterday, Joel? (or is that what you need a driver for)
That's why I need the driver.
Got the Intel can workingish. Really accurate.
luke asked whether there was any development with object recognition
Some on my end with hand recognition
